mapper.sql: SELECT TA.OPTN_CAT_NO /* prOptnCd.prOptnCdListBase */ , TA.OPTN_NO , TA.OPTN_NM , TA.SORT_SEQ , TA.USE_YN , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM FROM PR_OPTN_CD TA WHERE TA.OPTN_CAT_NO = #{optnCatNo}
mapper.select: SELECT OPTN_NO /* prOptnCd.getPrOptnCdListFromGoods */ , OPTN_NM FROM PR_OPTN_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND OPTN_CAT_NO = #{optnCatNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
